properties.name: eventType
properties.description: The name of the delegate function that produced the PluginResult object.

properties.name: region
properties.description: The region that triggered the event.

properties.name: authorizationStatus
properties.description: The status of the location permission for iOS.

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state of the phone in relation to the region. Inside/outside for example.

properties.name: error
properties.description: Error message, used only with monitoringDidFailForRegionWithError delegate.
